title: Looking for a Top Laner and a Support for Clash (Tier IV)
body:
Greetings,

We are currently looking for a top laner and a support for an easy going Clash team. We all have microphones and would like to keep that trend going. Preferably looking for people that play at least 3-4 champions in the role they are keen to play. 
If you're interested, send me a friend request and I shall invite you.

replies.body: Yeah I'm keen i play Tanky top lane or support and am in silver V
